      • buildRoad

        public void buildRoad()
        Build a road on map
        Pre conditions:
        Players must on their turn and must have enough resources and pieces
        Post conditions:
        Players must on their turn and must lost resources and pieces

      • buildSettlement

        public void buildSettlement()
        Build a settlement on map
        Pre conditions:
        Player must have enough resources and pieces
        Post conditions:
        Player must lost resources and pieces

      • buildCity

        public void buildCity()
        Upgrade settlement to city
        Pre conditions:
        Players must on their turn and must have enough resources and pieces
        Post conditions:
        Players must on their turn and must lost resources and pieces

      • buyDevCard

        public void buyDevCard()
        Buy DevCard from Bank
        Pre conditions:
        Players must on their turn and must have enough resources and bank must have DevCard left
        Post conditions:
        Players must on their turn and must lost resources and bank must lost a DevCard

      • tarde

        public void tarde()
        Trade Resources with other player or bank or harbor
        Pre conditions:
        Players must on their turn and have enough resources to trade
        Post conditions:
        Players must gain and lost different kind of resources

      • rollDice

        public void rollDice()
        Roll dices
        Pre conditions:
        Players must on their turn
        Post conditions:
        Dices must have new values

      • useDevCard

        public void useDevCard()
        User Development Card
        Pre conditions:
        Players must on their turn
        Post conditions:
        Players must have lost their card that's been used. DevCard effect must been applied in game
